message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Alice, $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is $12000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for 13500. It's a great compromise, considering the value this product brings.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13500 is still a bit out of my range. I'm firm on my budget of $12000. If you're not able to come down to that, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for 13000. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value this product brings.
